729507f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Wright Avenue
729507f-a.text:
2672 Richmond TTerrace, at the S.W. corner of
Wripht Avenue. At was thought to have been an old Decker
house. It was purcnased Rany years ago by Captain Garrett
P. Wright for one of nis chilaren. The eal estate atlases
from 1R74 to 1907 show it to have Lelunged to the Wrights.
The street shown is Wright Avenue. See also "Legends,
Stories ano Folklore of Old taten Asland" by Hines and Davis,
p. 115.
September 28, 1924
By William T. Davis t.aroug:u P. L. Sperr
